title: I have a question about my ban a month back.
body: I was banned about a month back, for toxic behaivor. I've read severaly articles saying if you had an escalated ban (i.e 7-14 day ban) you would not recieve end of season rewards, but, my ban was not escalated. i was never once chat banned, or 24 hour banned or anything like that. It was my first punishment i'd ever gotten in league. As the ban was not escalated, since i had no warning before hand (chat ban, or anything) do i still not recieve end of season rewards?  Thankyou for you help :D Slayzer

replies.body:
Hey Slayzer787, 

To get the best help you can possibly get for this question, it will probably be best to submit a ticket into Riot. There you can ask all the questions and they will look into it for you! Good luck :) 

Rito Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
